prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Narrator
mes: Melissa calls Virgil on her smoke break.
swipes: Melissa calls Virgil on her smoke break.

name: Melissa
mes: Hey Vergil, it's been a little while since I've talked to you, how are things going your way?

name: Vergil
mes: "Melissa. Your timing is impeccable. I was just thinking of you. Things have been...  interesting. Tell me, how are you faring?"
swipes: "Melissa. Your timing is impeccable. I was just thinking of you. Things have been...  interesting. Tell me, how are you faring?"

name: Melissa
mes: I've been doing pretty good. House hunting , that's a lot of fun. Not. But seriously, making progress. I've managed to get my speed back up on my drums. I had neglected that for a while, so that's an accomplishment.

name: Vergil
mes: "House hunting can be quite tedious. Though I'm pleased to hear about your progress with the drums. Your dedication to mastering various skills is admirable. Have you found any properties that catch your interest?"
swipes: "House hunting can be quite tedious. Though I'm pleased to hear about your progress with the drums. Your dedication to mastering various skills is admirable. Have you found any properties that catch your interest?"

name: Melissa
mes: Yes and no. I found a condo that fits what I need and the payment would be within my range but there's a homeowners association and that's something I would like to avoid. So I'm going to keep looking.

name: Vergil
mes: "Homeowners associations can be quite restrictive. Their rules often border on tyrannical control. A wise choice to avoid such constraints. What area are you focusing your search?"
swipes: "Homeowners associations can be quite restrictive. Their rules often border on tyrannical control. A wise choice to avoid such constraints. What area are you focusing your search?"
